review: I HAVE BEEN AN AMAZON PRIME MEMBER FOR YEARS.  THIS IS EXACTLY WHAT I HAD BEEN WAITING FOR.  LOVE IT.  SO MUCH FUN.  I AM GIVING UP CABLE.

review: Awesome. Easy set up and very intuitive.

review: I am very pleased with my Amazon Fire TV stick. The install & set up was easy, if I could do it anyone can. In just a short time I was looking through the Net Flix movie listGreat product!
author: Deborah Laughter Gibbs

review: I never could get Netflix to work. It always said title not available, try again later. I sent it back. The other apps did work.

review: As described, received when indicated on order

review: Very convenient, especially with music being synched.

review: So far happy with this product.  I have to reboot it at times but I'm thinking possibly it is my internet connection.  Other wise I enjoy all it has to offer.

review: I have Apple TV and I like it but with Voice control app and games, I got a new toy.

review: Great addition to watch movies in other rooms of the house!
